      • removingSslHandler

        public static void removingSslHandler(io.netty.channel.ChannelFuture future,
                                      io.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                                      boolean close)
        Remove the SslHandler (if any) cleanly
        Parameters:
        future - if not null, wait for this future to be done to removed the sslhandler
        channel -
        close - True to close the channel, else to only remove the SslHandler
